messages.message: for example why doesn't it work for https://dogfood.instabase.com/lydiagu/my-repo/fs/Instabase%20Drive/files/BAML%20loans/out/s1_process_files/1003_Scan.pdf.ibdoc, which only shows as raw protobuf data. i did generate this file a few weeks ago, while the first file was generated last friday

BUT I think I saw something about this when I added support for ib* as json files
Nvm lol I'm not sure how it's working if it is. It's not supposed to. ibdoc is not a supported extension in the text editor. At least from what I can tell.
I'm looking at `texteditor.py`  and it's supposed to be blocked
is the link i sent you the text editor? or it just a text viewer? you can't edit in it. just want to make sure we're looking at the right code
The link you sent is a preview one
@shaunak added support for the ibdoc to be rendered as json
In the preview mode, the ibdoc gets converted to the corresponding JSON file.  Iâ€™m not sure why in the second case we are adding `content-disposition=raw` as a redirect when trying to open the file
